price: and in your creation and the living creatures that He spreads out, there are signs for people who are certain in faith.
arabic: وَفِي خَلۡقِكُمۡ وَمَا يَبُثُّ مِن دَآبَّةٍ ءَايَٰتٞ لِّقَوۡمٖ يُوقِنُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
